settings.title: Settings
settings.themeDescription: Choose your preferred theme or follow system setting
settings.biometricDescription: Use fingerprint or Face ID to unlock app
settings.autoSyncDescription: Automatically scan for new verification emails
settings.autoDeleteEmailsDescription: Automatically delete verification emails after processing
settings.emailNotificationsDescription: New account detection and sync status alerts
settings.pinRequiredMessage: You need to set up a PIN before enabling biometric unlock.
settings.biometricAvailableMessage: Would you like to enable biometric unlock now that you have set up a PIN?
settings.setPinDescription: Create a secure PIN for app access

cloudSync.title: Cloud Sync Settings
cloudSync.enableSyncDescription: Automatically backup and sync your authenticator data
cloudSync.syncCompleteMessage: Data has been successfully synced to cloud
cloudSync.aboutSyncDescription:
• Data will be encrypted with AES-256 before uploading to cloud
• Supports automatic sync across multiple devices
• Regular backups of important data are recommended
• Sync process requires network connection
cloudSync.fillAllFields: Please fill in all server information

home.title: Welcome
home.subtitle: SecAuth
home.description: Manage your secure authentication codes and accounts safely.

add.title: Add Account
add.subtitle: Add New Authenticator Account
add.description: Choose a method to add your two-factor authentication account

scanQR.title: Scan QR Code
scanQR.description: Scan the QR code provided by the service

emailImport.title: Import from Email
emailImport.description: Automatically scan verification accounts from email

manualInput.title: Manual Input
manualInput.description: Manually enter account information and secret key

alerts.scanFailedMessage: Unrecognized QR code format, please enter account information manually.
alerts.incompleteData: Incomplete account data from QR code. Please complete the information manually.
alerts.errorMessage: Please fill in all required fields
alerts.unknownError: An unknown error occurred. Please try again.

emailParsing.title: Email Parsing
emailParsing.description: We've scanned your email for accounts that can be secured with two-factor authentication. Review the list below and activate 2FA for each account.

alerts.selectAccountMessage: Please select at least one account
alerts.successMessage: Successfully activated two-factor authentication for selected accounts

emailInput.title: Email Configuration
emailInput.subtitle: Configure Your Email Account
emailInput.description: Please enter your email credentials and server settings to scan for two-factor authentication setup emails.
emailInput.passwordHint: Use your regular email password or app-specific password if 2FA is enabled on your email account
emailInput.protocolHint: IMAP is recommended for most accounts. POP3 downloads emails locally.
emailInput.infoDescription:
• Securely connect to your email server
• Scan only for 2FA setup messages
• Extract account information automatically
• Keep your personal emails private
• Use encrypted connections only

alerts.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
alerts.connectionError: Failed to connect to email server. Please check your credentials and server settings.

emailIntegration.title: Email Integration
emailIntegration.grantAccessDesc: We'll now connect to your email server using the provided credentials to scan for two-factor authentication setup emails.

permissions.accessInboxDesc: Read and parse emails for account information
permissions.deleteProcessedDesc: Delete processed emails after extracting information

alerts.permissionDeniedMessage: Unable to connect to email server
alerts.errorMessage: Error occurred during email server connection

emailSettings.title: Email Settings
emailSettings.summaryDescription: Manage email connections, sync settings, and security options to automatically scan for two-factor authentication emails.

autoSync.title: Auto Sync
autoSync.subtitle: Automatically scan for new verification emails

autoDeleteEmails.title: Auto Delete Emails
autoDeleteEmails.subtitle: Automatically delete verification emails after processing

emailNotifications.title: Email Notifications
emailNotifications.subtitle: New account detection and sync status alerts

secureConnection.title: Secure Connection
secureConnection.subtitle: Use encrypted connection to access email

infoSection.title: About Email Scanning
infoSection.description:
• Only scans emails containing two-factor authentication information
• Does not read or store personal email content
• All connections use secure encryption protocols
• You can disconnect email connections at any time

disconnect.title: Disconnect
disconnect.message: Are you sure you want to disconnect from {{email}}?

connectedAccounts.title: Connected Accounts
connectedAccounts.subtitle: Email Account Management
connectedAccounts.description: Manage your email connections and control which accounts are used for automatic two-factor authentication scanning.
connectedAccounts.infoDescription:
• Connected emails will automatically scan for two-factor authentication emails
• You can disconnect or reconnect emails at any time
• Disconnecting will not delete imported accounts
• All email access uses secure encrypted connections

syncFrequency.title: Sync Frequency
syncFrequency.description: Set the frequency of email scanning, affecting battery usage and sync timeliness.

realtime.label: Real-time Sync
realtime.description: Scan immediately when emails are received

infoSection.title: Frequency Description
infoSection.description:
• Real-time sync: Most timely, but uses more battery
• Hourly: Recommended setting, balances performance and timeliness
• Manual sync: Most power efficient, requires manual trigger

pin.title: PIN Security
pin.enterNewDescription: Create a 6-digit PIN for app security
pin.maxAttemptsMessage: Too many incorrect attempts. Please try again later.
pin.verifyError: PIN verification failed. Please try again.
pin.setError: Failed to set PIN. Please try again.
pin.mismatchMessage: The PINs you entered don't match. Please try again.
pin.successMessage: Your PIN has been set successfully.

autoLock.title: Auto Lock Settings
autoLock.description: Choose when to automatically lock the app

autoLock.enableDescription: Automatically lock the app after a period of inactivity

timeout.title: Auto Lock Timeout
timeout.description: Choose how long the app waits before locking automatically

autoLock.backgroundLockDescription: Lock app when moved to background
autoLock.deviceLockDescription: Lock app when device is locked
autoLock.howItWorksDescription: Auto lock helps protect your sensitive data by automatically requiring authentication when the app has been inactive or moved to the background.
autoLock.settingsSaved: Auto lock settings have been saved successfully.
autoLock.saveError: Failed to save auto lock settings. Please try again.

qrScanner.permissionRequired: Camera permission is required to scan QR codes
qrScanner.invalidQRMessage: Please scan a valid authenticator QR code
qrScanner.instruction: Align the QR code within the scanning frame

viewEmail.title: Account Email
viewEmail.noEmail: No email associated with this account

accountMenu.emailViewDescription: This feature will display the original email containing the verification code setup information. Currently showing account details.
accountMenu.editNameDescription: Change the display name for this account
accountMenu.qrCodeDescription: Scan this QR code to add the account to another device
accountMenu.nameUpdatedMessage: Account name has been updated successfully
accountMenu.nameRequiredMessage: Please enter a valid account name
accountMenu.nameUpdateErrorMessage: Failed to update account name. Please try again.

importData.description: Restore your authenticator accounts from a backup file

importData.importErrorMessage: Failed to import data. Please check the file format.
importData.invalidFileMessage: The selected file is not a valid backup file
importData.noAccountsFoundMessage: No valid accounts found in the backup file
importData.overwriteWarningMessage: This will replace all existing accounts. Continue?

exportData.title: Export Data
exportData.description: Create a backup of all your authenticator accounts
exportData.exportFormatDescription: Choose the format for your backup file
exportData.includeSettingsDescription: Include theme, language, and other preferences
exportData.exportErrorMessage: Failed to create backup file. Please try again.
exportData.encryptionPasswordDescription: Set a password to encrypt your backup file
exportData.passwordRequired: Password is required for encrypted backups
